author: psmith
msg: Added Gump flag to the run so to fix some dependependency on the main log4j source code, this prevents a portion of the build from occuring and failing"

author: psmith
msg: Bit of a hack for gump.  The log4j main source code is not available during
a gump run, so I have set a 'gump' flag in the chainsaw gump run, which disables
generation of the JavaDoc for ALL receivers.
That's all I can think of doing for now, ideas appreciated.

author: markt
msg: Changes to the way the src is distributed:
- structure archive so build scripts work as is

author: trawick
msg: mod_charset_lite: Remove Content-Length when output filter can
invalidate it.  Warn when input filter can invalidate it.
